exceptions.exn: In environment server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \ otin clients Huniq : uniq clients d : dstatelet C : LockCoh d m : server_state H : getLocal server d = st :-> m The term "server" has type "nid" while it is expected to have type "Type".

original: intros. unfold getLocal. intros HgetLocal. assert (Hcoh: is_true (server \in (Cons server clients))). { rewrite uniq_cons in Huniq. by destruct Huniq. } destruct (server == server) as [_ | Hfalse]; last done. rewrite findPtUnR in HgetLocal. inversion HgetLocal; subst; clear HgetLocal. by inversion H.
